Description: Results from the Family Resources Survey for ficial year 2017 to 2018, providing information on income and circumstances of UK households. Includes a table of Carer information.
Name: Family Resources Survey for ficial year 2017 to 2018,
Sizing Notes: Simple table structure with footnotes, some tabs  have 2 tables with numbers and percentages.and graphs included. Different use of age complicates things.
